mainPage.title: Studio that inspires meaningful events. We develop brands and help them communicate with the audience.
mainPage.subtitle: We organize large-scale events, develop BTL promotions and special projects, ensure the presence of companies in the media, and design products and services.
mainPage.contactUs: Feel free to contact us
mainPage.workText:
Our clients include the largest retailers, global pharmaceutical companies and leaders in the FMCG segment.

We know how to delve into the customer's area at the expert level: this is the only way to guarantee the quality of the project. We think beyond the scope of the brief and strive to do more than the client expects.

workPage.text: We create concepts for corporate and public events and fully implement them. We provide full technical equipment and turnkey development of the site, catering and security, well-coordinated work of staff. We provide booking and accompaniment of artists.

studioPage.subtitle: We believe that every event happens only once, and we must make this experience unique.
studioPage.title: Mad Band is a studio that combines creativity, pleasure, provocation, innovation and quality.
studioPage.text: Our team knows how to understand the product and the customer's task at the expert level, this is the only way to guarantee the high-quality implementation of the project. MadBand combines creativity with responsibility and open communication. We think beyond the scope of the brief and strive to do more than the client expects.

mission.label: Mission
mission.text: Our mission is to generate in the customer the desire to create meanings that will inspire people. We ourselves experience the pleasure of working on creative projects with an ambitious and bright idea.

philosophy.label: Philosophy
philosophy.text: Our philosophy is to put a special meaning in each project that affects all the senses and the mind of the audience. It is important for us to make your event or product not only beautiful, but also inspiring.
philosophy.bigText: It is important for us to make your event or product not only beautiful, but also inspiring.

We truly believe in the power of meaning, and that's why it works!
